Package com.flipfit.business

Class AdminServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.AdminServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminService
public class AdminServiceImpl extends Object implements AdminService
The Class AdminServiceImpl. Implements business logic operations for admin management in the FlipFit system. Uses Stream API for functional programming style data filtering.
